plot: Stakes are high for Melissa as she single-handedly hosts her first annual Envy Fashion Show and tries to prove her boutique's legitimacy. Meanwhile, Dolores surprises her ex-husband, Frank, and Teresa considers her financial future. Later, it's time to get everything out in the open as the ladies meet for lunch. Siggy plays mediator to Jacqueline, Teresa, and Melissa, and ultimately Jacqueline makes for a great escape.
